attributes.action: More work places need to have Mental Health training .
attributes.additional_details: I was diagnosed with depression & anxiety in 2018, I have not had much support in the work place and my mental health has suffered.There is not much training or knowledge for employers of how to support or understand people that are going through stress or mental health at work.
attributes.background:
I would like Mental Health training to be done in the workplace by Employers & staff.
As it is needed due to the growing amount of people especially in the workplace suffering from mental illnesses and not getting any support or training on the issue.
